function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Vulnerable groups such as the elderly, women, the poor, and migrants disproportionately affected by pandemic","Impact":"Increased health risks and social disparities","Mitigation":"Improved access to healthcare and social support","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring","People":"Elderly, women, poor, migrants","Owner":"Healthcare providers, government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Shift towards digital life and remote work","Impact":"Increased reliance on digital infrastructure, potential for cyber threats","Mitigation":"Cybersecurity measures, digital literacy programs","Technologies":"Cybersecurity tools, remote collaboration platforms","People":"Remote workers, organizations, governments","Owner":"IT departments, cybersecurity experts, employers"},{"Description":"Changing trust in local authorities","Impact":"Potential for misinformation, lack of compliance with public health measures","Mitigation":"Transparent communication, community engagement","Technologies":"Communication platforms, data analytics for public sentiment","People":"Local residents, government officials, community leaders","Owner":"Local authorities, communication experts"}]}
